summary: 22 interactive and customizable potion racks you can use in your mod.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=3][u][b]Modders Resource - Potion Racks[/b][/u]
[/size][/font][font=Arial]
[font=Tahoma]- 22 interactive and customizable potion racks similar to the bookshelves of the vanilla game.
- The racks can be customized to place also ingredients, food and clutter items on them.
- To visit the testing cell in game: [i]coc aaaPotionRacks[/i]
- Short tutorial included.[/font]




[size=3][u][b]Change Log[/b][/u][/size]
[/font][font=Tahoma][b]
[/b]Version 1.1
[/font][list]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=1]Added a Dragonborn version with 8 more shelves. [/size][/font]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=1]Changed the formlist property values for the container script to default None,[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=1] so no further action needs to be taken after a rack was copied.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=1]Removed a doubled up shelf from the testing cell.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=1]Updated the tutorial.[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Arial][size=1]
[/size]


[size=3][u][b]Install / Uninstall[/b][/u][/size]

[font=Tahoma]As usual, the .esp file goes to the Skyrim\Data folder, the scripts go to the Skyrim\Data\Scripts folder.
To uninstall, delete the files.[/font][/font]
author: Ghaunadaur
